FILTERED_WATERBODY: A subset of the NHDWaterbody layer filtered using specified NHD FCodes.
FILTERED_FLOWAREAS: A subset of the NHDArea layer filtered using specified NHD FCodes.
COMBINED_FA_WB: The NHDArea and NHDWaterbody layers combined.
BANKFULL_NETWORK: The NHDFlowlines layer with an attribute 'bankfull_m' added that is used to buffer the network. This layer is the network without the segments that fall within NHDWaterbody or NHDArea features.
BANKFULL_POLYGONS: Polygons derived by buffering the bankfull_network feature using the 'bankfull_m' attribute. This value is calculated using region equations for bankfull width.
DIFFERENCE_POLYGONS: The bankfull polygons with areas that overlap the NHDArea layer removed.
CHANNEL_AREA: A polygon feature class representing the bankfull channel for the input network. The filtered NHDArea and NHDWaterbody features are combined with the buffered NHDFlowline features to create a single feature class.
